meanings.definition: The act of submitting something again.
meanings.sent1: She made multiple resubmissions of her essay to improve it.
meanings.sent2: The teacher requested resubmissions of the homework assignment.
meanings.sent3: After several resubmissions, her essay was finally accepted.
meanings.sent4: His constant resubmissions showed his dedication to improvement.
meanings.sent5: The resubmissions allowed her to perfect her work.

meanings.definition: Items that have been submitted again.
meanings.sent1: The resubmissions of the documents were necessary for review.
meanings.sent2: The resubmissions included updated information for the project.
meanings.sent3: The resubmissions piled up on the teacher's desk, awaiting grading.
meanings.sent4: His resubmissions were like second chances for his work.
meanings.sent5: The resubmissions contained valuable revisions for the report.
